website_summaries.verdict: Popular cleaner/conditioner that not only cleans, but adds luster and protects, too.
pros: 2-in-one cleaner/conditioner works on all leathers, real or synthetic, in your car or in your house
Takes away the dirt, leaves a shine, and guards against future staining, damage from moisture, drying out, dullness, and cracking
Easy-to-apply, controlled, spray bottle format, with a pleasant, non-chemical, fragrance that the manufacturer says smells like real leather
cons: A small percent of users didn't get the cleaning results they desired, and a few cautioned that it makes surfaces slippery (e.g
be careful using it on a vinyl floor)

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stained / ruined our new leather sofa . Left ugly faded spots . Do not use this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Intense user

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mostly on leather couches and leather car seats. It does a great job (in my opinion) of cleaning and moisturizing the leather. I always love the "slippery" feel on the seats when I'm done with it. I've used it on some other random things as well - such as watch bands, baseball gloves, purses, etc. It seems to do the trick. For full disclosure, I haven't really compared it to other products - but it's doing the job for me so I haven't had to worry about looking for other products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a leather handbag that was looking so soiled, I began shopping for a replacement. Then I reconsidered, thinking maybe it could be cleaned. I was extremely pleased that Mr Leather actually removed almost all the built up dirt, and now my handbag looks almost new. I followed directions about applying it, but also judiciously used a Magic Sponge. When the dirt was gone, I applied more Mr Leather to condition the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It moisturized the couch and brightened up the leather with a sweet fresh leather smell
customer_reviews.text: Used this initially on a dark brown leather couch. It moisturized the couch and brightened up the leather with a sweet fresh leather smell, however it did not have a "staying effect" for more than a half week/week. You will need to apply weekly on leather furniture to continue that shine and great smell. On the flip side of things, I decided to try this product on the black dash/console of a 2004 TJ Jeep(plastic/synthetic Chrysler dash), and holy god, does it work well, and repels dust. This stuff seems to be armor-all on steroids.. at least with my car. With all cleaners, try a small spot, and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car seats
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner didn't do a great job on my leather tote bag, but it worked very well on my light leather car seats, so it was worth buying any way. It has a pleasant smell which cleared quickly on the car seats, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this cleaner for years and love it. I use it on my leather sofas ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cleaner for years and love it. I use it on my leather sofas and chairs and it works great, and doesn't leave the leather with a tacky feeling that is normally felt using other leather cleaners and conditioners. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Etchechury

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today. I had just cleaned a cream colored sofa with leather cleaner wipes. I sprayed this on and wiped off with paper towels. They were covered in dirt that the wipes hadn't removed. It also leaves a nice sheen. The other thing I like is that it's a thin liquid spray (like windex.) not a thick cream that you have to use a lot of elbow grease. Dirt comes off very easily. I am no longer exhausted after cleaning a leather sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Love the real leather scent!
customer_reviews.text: Best leather cleaner/conditioner around! I Love the real leather smell of this product. I purchased some from Marshals and when I went back they didn't have anymore with no new stock foreseeable so i looked on Amazon. I found it and the price is fair, I look for more leather things to clean because the scent is so great!! Buy it you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pandolfino

customer_reviews.title: Best leather conditioner for leather couches and sofas
customer_reviews.text: I started using Mr. Leather when leather on my couch arms and sofa arms started to fade and crack. It worked great and extended the life of the leather on my couch and sofa. My only regret is I didn't start using it before the leather started to dry, fade, and crack.
customer_reviews.author: The Californian

customer_reviews.title: Loved how clean it looks
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot of work on my white leather coat but it was worth it. Loved how clean it looks. Did not clear all stains but at least I can leave home wearing the coat again. See my attached image - before is the sleeve on the bottom and after treatment is the one on the top. It even looked better after a second round of cleaning. Just took a lot of work and scrubbing time.
customer_reviews.author: Mashav Shelef

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I know of that will make your car smell like you just drove it off the showroom floor. No B.S. this stuff smells like a leather shop.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine, but not a great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my father highly recommended it. It does a fantastic job of shining leather. But, it doesn't clean very well. I was hoping to cut out the multi step process I usually use to clean my leather furniture. Usually start with a cleaner made for leather that you dilute with water and then wash your furniture with. Followed by a leather conditioner and then a protectant. All three products I'm referring too came from sofa mart where I got the couches.. This product unfortunately doesn't clean, shine or protect nearly as well. It does work well for a quick spruce up before company!
customer_reviews.author: KB Tapply

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Cleaner! So Glad I Went w/ This Brand!!
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing every single Leather Cleaner on Amazon, I decided to go with this brand. Oh man, I am so glad I did. It has a wonderful smell, gives a great shine, and extremely easy to apply. I have seen reviews where other brands that offer the wipes would have mold inside of container. VERY SCARY! I have a pregnant wife at home, so I am very cautious on what products I use in the house. I also have extremely sensitive allergies as well. I don't have that much experience with leather cleaners, and probably never will. Simply because this spray meets my standards on every level.
customer_reviews.author: Jond13

customer_reviews.title: Used for years
customer_reviews.text: I have several pieces of leather furniture that I have owned for years. This helps keep it clean from dogs, kids, life. Order this stuff by the dozen and have to replenish every 5 years. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mushmouth

customer_reviews.title: Not a single dirty spot on my leather sofas were cleaned with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was leaking when it arrived It cleaned ABSOLUTELY NOTHING that regular water wouldn't clean. Not a single dirty spot on my leather sofas were cleaned with this product. I even tried leaving it on for a minute (directions say clean immediately after application) but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Armen Mikaelian

customer_reviews.title: BEST leather restorer/protectant
customer_reviews.text: I have used at least six other leather products and this is the BEST one! This one is SUPERB. Put it on, let it soak in, add more as needed based on how needy the leather is, let dry, then buff to a shine! You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on the ultimate test: a white leather sofa.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on an off-white Ikea Karlstad leather sofa, and my concerns that it would discolor the very light leather were unwarranted (and likely "unwarranteed," too!) I will say that, immediately after the first cleaning with this, the product may have made the leather .00001% darker, but the fact that it effortlessly removed a layer of dirt made the whole thing look lighter and brighter when all was said and done. I also love that it's a very easy spray and wipe process, unlike some other leather cleaners that require multiple steps.
customer_reviews.author: Figen

customer_reviews.title: Use and repeat, use and repeat
customer_reviews.text: Really gets the job done; use and you'll see a shiny, clean, like-new result... Just don't expect it to last. If you're a single person with no pets, it may last weeks or months but, introduce any kids and/or pets (we have a chihuahua as well as 2.5 year old) and you'll find yourself using this weekly or more. Especially on dark leather. But the product itself is great, just wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: GDP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use on the tan leather seats in my 2005 Accord and was very satisfied with the results! Treated the seats a total of 3 times and then followed up with the Leather Honey Conditioner, also purchased from Amazon. The seats look 100x better and feel great. Will be using this combo (cleaner and conditioner) in the future on other cars to help keep the leather looking new for man years to come. Highly recommend this product because of its effectivness and ease of use! Try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is amazing. my 6 year old has a habit of ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing. my 6 year old has a habit of writing on walls and my leather couch with ink, markers, you name it. if you get the ink right away, ALL OF IT comes off. The smell is amazing. Use in my car as well. Love it
customer_reviews.author: gqueen2012

customer_reviews.title: Shiny but smelly
customer_reviews.text: The shine that this product leaves is great. Truly leaves my couch looking like new....and it gets a lot of traffic with my.3 lids and all their friends. Not to mention a dog and 2 cats that think the couch is their jungle gym and their bedroom. The biggest drawback is the overpowering smell which extends throughout the first floor....for days. Would probably not but again based on smell alone though definitely does what it is billed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Renata D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for leather couches
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and leaves our leather couches looking great with a nice shine. I like that it doesn't have a strong smell and doesn't feel greasy afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like new leather too!
customer_reviews.text: I may use it before guests arrive for card night or something, but really for no other reason. This stuff upps the luster of my leather's surface and doesn't do much in the way of penetrating or actual restoring (I use Honey Leather for that), but does help protect against some of the day-to-day stuff though. I DO love that new leather smell, man! I don't know why, but it seems the "leather smell" products are kinda' hard to come by... at least in my area.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: He used this to clean a regular size couch and the love seat, what a difference
customer_reviews.text: My husband sleeps on the couch a lot, as he comes home from work late. The couch was a dingy nasty brown/black color. He used this to clean a regular size couch and the love seat, what a difference! Didn't take a lot of scrubbing, simply rub on/off. The couches look new, and no greasy residue. I have ordered another bottle to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Get something else!
customer_reviews.text: This product was somewhat cleansing... But be really, really leery. Even though I followed the instructions, areas of my couch that had very small droplets sit for more than about 10 secs were altered in color (lighter). Thank goodness I only used it on the back which faces the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Silver

customer_reviews.title: which tends to get pretty dirty. The dirt very easily comes off with ...
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works very well. We purchased it for our beige leather couch, which tends to get pretty dirty. The dirt very easily comes off with this product. The only reason I am not giving this product a five star review is that it has a different smell. It is not bad, just not what I was expecting. The smell is gone within a few minutes. We will be re-ordering this product once our original bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Barteck

customer_reviews.title: ... was unable to purchase this produce locally so was glad to find it here
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to purchase this produce locally so was glad to find it here. I have found that it has kept my Lee Sands Eel skin wallets and other items looking brand new for many years. In fact these wallets are more than ten years old and the photo shows that they still shine as they did when new!
customer_reviews.author: Frugality

customer_reviews.title: Got dried candle wax off of my leather couch!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently dropped a candle on the floor and some of the wax splashed onto my beige leather couch. I didn't notice until almost a week later! I had some of this around and it got all of the wax completely off!! You literally can't tell there was wax there at all!! Amazing!! I suggest using the smallest amount necessary and wiping it off immediately with a soft cloth. Works great and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: ArrW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! We own several pieces of leather furniture (sofas, chairs, auto seats). This product is VERY EASY to use and it works really great. I love the easy to use part because with many other products you have to rub it in; let it dry and rub it off. It takes a lot of time and it takes muscles to rub rub rub! Our leather furniture loves the moisture and cleaning this product provides. Good luck with your leather! :)
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: Good: very effective cleaner. Used on a white leather sectional. Not so good: leaves your leather with a slight sheen to it. Also, there’s a ozone like smell when it dries. This is probably the ‘protective’ properties of this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Mr. leather spray
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on leather furniture both old and new to soften and protect the leather. Works perfectly. Easy to apply and then I just rub it in and wipe with a soft cloth. Very simple. Planning on treating new couches every few months to protect and clean them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DKM

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is WONDERFUL! I used it on all of my leather ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is WONDERFUL! I used it on all of my leather furniture before Christmas. It brought back the sheen to the old pieces and seems to help repel dust and pet hair. grrrrr.... lol Honestly, I purchased two bottles and had use very little. I plan to use it on my husbands old boots and some other old items. I wish I could find a polish for Brass and Silver that was this easy. Happy lady! :-D
customer_reviews.author: Butterflittin

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner and mild conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It bulldozed the jean stains off my beige leather car seats like nobody's business. It left a mild shine, light conditioning coat, and kept the beige color the same. Treated two of my 10 year old baseball mitts and did a reasonably good job. Provided protection and restored some color. If you're like me, not wanting to commit to a true, thick conditioner, Mr. Leather is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Yu

customer_reviews.title: Reliable leather cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and Audi A4 and i wanted to keep EVERYTHING about it clean and spectacular. I bought this based on the other positive reviews. The seats continue to shine and keep their deep black color. It cleans and conditions giving it a slick feel as you sit and drive. I give 2-3 sprays on a microfiber towel and wipe the surface of all the seats, steering wheel and even the dashboard. You don't need a lot to clean the surface of your seats which is great when your on a budget. Great product. I will recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: S. Durant

customer_reviews.title: You must form your own opinion !
customer_reviews.text: not too sure about this stuff. Do not have leather saddlebags on a motorcycle, maybe it is designed for outdoor abused leather. it did not dress up my work boots like saddle soap or mink oil. It made vinyl car seats looks nice. Made my boots dull so I know I do not want on my leather coat. this is something you may want to experiment with.
customer_reviews.author: Picky customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass this up!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING product! I've never been so excited to clean anything before in my life! I look forward to shining, cleaning, and protecting my leather belts and wallets with this product. I have yet to try it on my leather-wrapped steering wheel, but I bet the results will be great! I have 4 leather belts, 1 leather wallet, and 3 leather shoes that I clean every 2-3 weeks with this product. It leaves them smooth, shiny, and protected! Dirt and water glide off. The smell is pleasant as well. If you love your leather, you will try Mr. Leather.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products on my leather couches. This product is by far the easiest to apply. It also smells just like leather. It cleans well and leaves a great finish. It does not have a greasy film after it has time to cure. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Really good basic cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very good basic cleaner. I bought it to try to get some hard stains off my account and it didn’t really do much for me but it did clean really well.
customer_reviews.author: Junglemom1963Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all my leather items.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use Mr. Leather on my leather shoes, leather sofa, leather car seats and on my leather purses. It instantly revives dull dry leather and gives a nice shine. It cleans up any spills left behind by daily use of items. I love the pleasant new leather scent.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Quick Clean Ups
customer_reviews.text: This spray on leather cleaner is super easy to use, and cleans leather very well. I have used this product to dust off shoes, purses, and leather jackets that have not been used in a while, to give them a new luster. Just spray on and wipe off with a cloth. The product is not greasy or messy. I like how handy it is to keep in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: CeciLafayette

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a nice glossy look.
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent and you do not have to buff anything out , I use it on my leather jackets , boots and sneakers. It leaves everything glossy but not too shiny...
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This leather cleaner is excellent on leather! I gave it 5 stars because we purchased another leather cleaner from the furniture store for $50.00 and it didn't work as well as the Mr. Leather!!!!!!! It cleans up the grandkids spills and droppings that come with the territory! When you get older you realize that Leather is the best option and this cleaner does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Requires a bit of elbow grease for those hard to get out stains, however it did the job great and left the leather like new for my 2016 Honda CRV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Leather Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leather cleaner I've ever used.I use it to keep the leather seats in my convertible Lexus.Riding with the top down and sometimes car sitting in the sun (Texas)with seats exposed really dries the leather out.This stuff restores the leather very quickly and beautifully.Not much buffing,just rub it in.Clean both pair of my leather pants...beautiful.Saved myself 80.00.Can't wait 4 my next btl.,got a leather jacket waitin.
customer_reviews.author: dmatt777

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Excellent cleaner worked very good on my leather sofa and my leather shoes. The smell is like clean leather. Love how my 5 year old sofa shine, looks like new. I will buy more. Excelente producto dejó mi sofá limpio y con un brillo suave como nuevo y el olor es como el olor de la piel. Mande a comprar más .
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: ... oil in this product is what makes it so useful and functional for treating my premium handbags
customer_reviews.text: The mink oil in this product is what makes it so useful and functional for treating my premium handbags, jackets and boots. I wish it came in gallon containers! :)
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have purchased it more than once. Works well and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: abc123

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically. It actually cleans the dirt and leaves a wonderful conditioner that is not slippery at all, unlike some of the other well known brands out there. I will be ordering more of this.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Great for Leather
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Leather cleans and conditions my leather lounge chair and the seating in my car. I am very satisfied with Mr. Leather. James F.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Little less cracked, but cleans?
customer_reviews.text: It made the leather a little less cracked but it didn't really seem to clean the leather as I didn't see a big difference in the half of the sofa I used it on and the before use half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I love the clean soft feeling it leaves on the leather. Great product really works!
customer_reviews.author: Hattiegurl

customer_reviews.title: Made our couches look like new!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on our living room furniture and it works great. Doesn’t leave a residue but cleans amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: tracy stewart

customer_reviews.title: I have a couple of beautiful leather couches
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of beautiful leather couches, but my kitty kept spraying them and they were in poor shape. I couldn't get the stains or odor out with other cleaners. After polishing them just one time with this product, they looked like new. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Makes leather and anything it touches very slippery. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes leather and anything it touches very slippery. I sprayed it on my motorcycle jacket and the residual spray landed on the wooden floor making it very slick and it's been a hassle to try to get it off the floor. Every time I touch my leather jacket, it leaves a slippery residue on my hands which is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lin

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Quick
customer_reviews.text: Best and quickest way to clean my shoes and put a low shine on my everyday leather sneakers. It is also great for cleaning dress shoes, but you still need shoe polish to get a really great shine. It really excels when it is used to clean shoes that have been abused and have lots of dirt and wear on them. Best for a Quick cleanup. This will always be a part of my shoe care arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Neil O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It cleans and shines my leather sofas, but if you miss a spot, you will notice it. It does leave streaks if I don't wipe it completely even. I do like it, and it smells nice. Lasts much longer than their wipes, which is why I bought it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: lovesilver

customer_reviews.title: Just for one day makes bright
customer_reviews.text: It's good to clean leather sofas , it makes bright for one day
customer_reviews.author: oljira abdi

customer_reviews.title: a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: It cleans great! Does what it needs to do for leather.
customer_reviews.author: C Tolley

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: My shoe cobbler recommends this and it's the only leather cleaner/conditioner he sells in his shop. I keep trying others, but keep coming back to Mr. Leather. It cleans and conditions better than any other product I've tried, and is cheaper too. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: JARTX

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Leather Car Seats!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't decided whether to purchase the spray or cream leather conditioner so bought both. Spray is easier to apply but both products work equally well. Used the spray on my car's leather seats and very pleased with the end result .. they are again protected and showroom clean.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Santee

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works GREAT. No nasty residue and much easier to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched from the wipes to the spray. I used this on my leather Lazy Boy recliner and on my car seats in 2 vehicles. This stuff works GREAT. No nasty residue and much easier to use and economical vs the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: TheOldDude

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product took off so much dirt off my leather sofas. Wow! I didnt even know leather accumulates dirt. It conditions perfectly. Not greasy but still conditions. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: WENDY

customer_reviews.title: Making my up mind
customer_reviews.text: Went on so easy but not sure how much it improved my leather. Do not get it on floors it is like ice if you do. I want to try a second application.
customer_reviews.author: Double S

customer_reviews.title: Mr Wonderful Leather
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Italian Leather sofa and I knew I wanted a product to keep it conditioned so after checking several products I ordered Mr Leater. it arrived very fast I might add (Thanks Amazon) I used the product right away and I truly love it. the smell is great and it makes the sofa so soft. I will continue to use this product instead of the expensive Gaurdsman that I purchased with the sofa, which I thinks smells really bad.. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: cyndilou

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: things I love about it: - it cleans so well, you'll never know how dirty your leather furniture is until you try this. - leaves a nice shine - does not leave a strong odor. one thing to be careful about is that if you spray it on leather and leave it without spreading it, it will leave marks. It will clean all the dirt where you spray it, so I spray it on a little towel and then clean the furniture with the towel. In my experience this gives the best results!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: I used it on our black leather couch. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it on our black leather couch. It made the couch very slippery (be careful sitting down after it dries, or you'll fall off!) and the leather felt less supple than it even had before use. The minimal cracking our couch had before I applied the product was accentuated after the product dried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great leather cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is fantastic! I polish my couches every other week. I used to use Weimans which leaves white spots if not wiped perfectly. This cleaner made my couches shine! I have used it 3 times and it has brought back some of the shine that was dulled by the Weimans. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MathLovingMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my cream-colored leather couch nicely. Very easy. It looks great. So glad I purchased this. Light colored couches just get dingy over time. This product brought the beautiful color back. Good leather smell. Makes the couch feel new.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvana

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for leather seats
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great and works really well on my 10 year old tan leather seats. My friend who is a car guy asked me what product I used to condition my seats because he could really tell a difference after I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great product. LOVE the leather smell too
customer_reviews.text: I had a bottle years ago - then I couldn't find it. Great product. LOVE the leather smell too, it lasts a while. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use it once every month to condition my leather furniture. We have 2 sofa set and dinning chairs of leather. Whenever I use it, i immediately notice a difference. what a brilliant shine and smell it gives to my furniture. Bought 3 bottles on my first purchase. Almost finished...ready to order another pack of 3 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Beetle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice leather cleaner. I wish it would help the leather shine some. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: Only one to use
customer_reviews.text: Have several kinds in cleaning closet.and this is the one I always come back too
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Leather Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that Mr. Leather Cleaner did not take oFF all the mildew that was in the leather pores...otherwise it is Fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Non Greasy
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Leather is one of the better cleaner I have used in awhile. We have a older leather couch that showed wear and after cleaning it with this product it really spruced it up. I like the fact this leather cleaner doesn't leave any greasy feel and also has low oder. This product is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: border collie lady

customer_reviews.title: great protection and
customer_reviews.text: works as expected for cars and furniture. no complaints. great protection and luster
customer_reviews.author: amanda Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Make old leather furniture look new!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner and conditioner. My leather furniture is 14 years old and it looked shiny and new after using this product. What a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. White

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get the shine I would have liked but it definitely cleaned the leather
customer_reviews.author: maryTN

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well cleaning and conditioning my leather couch.
customer_reviews.author: DavidTN

customer_reviews.title: My leather sofa looked good for about 20 minutes and then was dull again
customer_reviews.text: This product did not do what I expected it to do. My leather sofa looked good for about 20 minutes and then was dull again. I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: ann taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite for my car seats. Reasonably priced, easy to use, works great. Can't fin in brick an mortar store any more. Happy to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Winter

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: FAVE! I use it on my couch weekly and it keeps it clean. Has a "leather" scent that sounds cheesy but is actually nice. I'm on my third bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany N. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, works well on both real and faux leather. I have sofas with a combination of real and faux leather and it shines and cleans both the same and doesnt strip the color off of either. Its not greasy and the shine lasts long after the moisture goes away.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: BEST Leather Cleaner/Conditioner on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leather cleaner & conditioner on the market. It does it all without any type of grease or wax buildup being left behind. I use this on my dining room chairs as well as my love seat & sofa. It leaves the leather supple & soft.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for leather upholstery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my leather couch. It is economical and easy to use. Just wipes away and leaves the couch looking supple and luminous, with no chemical smell. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ANCO

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a Modani sectional. The Modani rep told ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Modani sectional. The Modani rep told me they use Mr. Leather once a month to clean the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful. My leather couch and love seat are old
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. My leather couch and love seat are old, and they needed a pick me up and some softening. This product did just that.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but white sofas in a public space isn't the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got white leather sofas in one of our lobbies. Looks great but white sofas in a public space isn't the smartest thing to do but this cleaner got everything out and kept it conditioned. Will order again when I run out
customer_reviews.author: Heran P.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Italian leather sofa and a cat - so the finish was getting dull. This has restored the luster and sheen to better than new. Also as others commented, it leaves a really attractive leather scent. Love this product and I'm so happy I bought four. The only caveat I have to put out there is that like any other leather cleaner, protector, it leaves any surface pretty slippery so if you get it on your floor, you should probably wipe it off with a damp cloth or else you might end up sliding across the floor!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great product but careful not to get on floors
customer_reviews.text: I generally really love this product, BUT the only thing I've found is that if I get any on my wood floors it makes them super slick and slippery. I had my kids slip and fall next to the couch several times cause it makes the floors really waxy.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim L.

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner ever
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaner ever, does a great job with cleaning and conditioning all leathers. Leaves a nice leather scent as well. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Refreshes the leather and no off smells
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Refreshes the leather and no off smells. I used it on leather furniture. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Use on my leather furniture monthly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help clean, shine, and preserve my new leather sectional. Found this on Amazon and after reading the reviews decided to try it. I love it!!! It has a nice leather scent and does a great job of cleaning and shining up my leather. Hard to say if it's actually helping it preserve it yet (that's the only reason I did 4 stars instead of 5) as I haven't used it that long yet. But it does seem to be helping keep the leather soft and supple.
customer_reviews.author: AGlod536

customer_reviews.title: Not great for automotive
customer_reviews.text: If your using this for automotive seats it does not work very well. Was not impressed with the products long term protection. Kind of dulled my seats too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Removes dirt instantly simply by wiping with a clean cloth. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy F. McQuide

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to apply, no hard rubbing in. Nice shine and I was able to use the couch soon after. Not sure on lasting value but seems good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Pleasant fragrance. Quickly cleans and leaves no residue.

customer_reviews.title: non-oily leather cleaner and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: we've been very happy with this product. We use in our cars and on the leather seating in our house. It does a good job of conditioning the leather without an oily residue.
customer_reviews.author: Comstock M

customer_reviews.title: Shines and cleans great! Yaadi!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, loved it! Used it to clean my leather shoes and it works great, has a lovely mild leather scent and it doesn't leave a oily nor greasy finish!
customer_reviews.author: Blackrose

customer_reviews.title: Shines all my handbags!
customer_reviews.text: just tried it on my handbags, both high-end ones and non-high-end ones...it really shines all like brand new again! love it! now i'm confident to use it to clean and condition my genuine leather jackets!
customer_reviews.author: XW

product_meta.title: Mr. Leather 707371 Cleaner & Conditioner - 16oz Spray
product_meta.description:
Size:16 Ounce"

Cleaning leather isn’t enough—get the whole package and cover all the bases with Mr. Leather Cleaner and Conditioner Liquid Spray.

 This cleaner adds three key functions to leather maintenance: it cleans, shines, and protects. It removes dirt and grime, shines and restores leather to its natural luster, and leaves a protective coating to stave off future wear and tear. It works on all types and colors of colors of leather and leaves no oily residue. It also requires no rubbing or buffing: just wipe it on and you’re good to go.

 This cleaner moisturizes leather pieces to prevent cracking and dulling. It also repels water and restores the leather’s natural beauty, ensuring pieces that look as good as new. Unlike artificial cleaners, it leaves behind a pleasant leather scent. 

Mr. Leather Cleaner and Conditioner works on almost all leather surfaces, making life at home and outdoors easier and simpler. For home use, it’s perfect for furniture like couches and for garments such as jackets, shoes, purses, and briefcases. In your car, you can spray it onto seats and wipe it in to restore their appearance. It’s specially designed for thick hide and it works great, making life at home more efficient. 

 Mr. Leather Cleaner and Conditioner Liquid Spray comes in a convenient bottle with a spray applicator. Shake it well before using.

"
feature_bullets: WORKS ON ALL LEATHERS - Looking for the best leather cleaner in the market? Then Mr. Leather Cleaner and Conditioner is the product for you. It works on virtually all home and vehicle leathers, real or synthetic, so you can clean couches and garments faster and more thoroughly. It can be applied to shoes, jackets, purses, briefcases, furniture, and car seats. This spray is specially engineered for thick hides to make life easier for you.

CLEANS, SHINES, AND PROTECTS - Mr. Leather Cleaner and Conditioner provides three functions for every piece of leather: it cleans, shines, and protects. It removes built-up dirt and dust from the surface, and once wiped off it shines and restores the natural luster of the leather. Leaving behind a layer of protection to guard the piece from future wear and tear.

EASY SPRAY APPLICATION - This 16 fl. oz. natural cleaner comes in liquid form in a convenient bottle with a spray nozzle. Compared to pour-on liquids and creams, it's easier to use and more efficient because every spray is controlled. It's also cost efficient, as there's minimal chance of wasting or over-pouring.

MOISTURIZES AS IT CLEANS - Over time, leather products fade and show signs of damage. This spray moisturizes surfaces such as sofas, car seats, and shoes to prevent them from cracking and dulling. It brings back their original appearance and keeps them from looking dehydrated. And unlike artificial cleaners, it leaves behind a cool leather scent.

REPELS WATER - Leather has a naturally waterproof exterior, but in the long run it's still affected by moisture. This results in permanent damage, soiling, or deterioration of aesthetic qualities over time. Mr. Leather helps leather items repel water and restores their natural beauty, guaranteeing pieces that look as good as new.
